SUBJECT: Borrowlenses.com - Order ##### - Late, Declined and Stolen - RESPONSE REQUIRED
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your order is unpaid and considerably late, and your card has been declined! Please immediately return our equipment, or else we’ll be forced to take civil and criminal action.
Please call us ASAP at 844-853-6737 ext. 5 so we can resolve this urgent matter.
Note in Section 5 of our Lease Agreement:
Lessee is responsible for all costs associated with any repair or replacement (without deduction for depreciation) of the Equipment necessitated as a result of Lessee’s usage, possession, transportation or failure to return the Equipment for any reason, including, without limitation, as a result of the negligence or willful misconduct of Lessee, its employees, agents, or contractors.
You can reference the full Lease Agreement here: www.borrowlenses.com/content/rental_agreement
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Asset Recovery Department 844-8-LENSES (844-853-6737) x5
